title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: Enhancing Instructional Design Skills Using Design Thinking and Reflective Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can propose instructional design solutions for ill-structured problems in science by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can analyze their own design decision-making processes and derive improvement strategies through reflective writing.
Learners can clearly articulate their professional identity and role awareness as instructional designers.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
